thread.title: le stanze del vetro presents ettore sottsass’ glass exhibition in venice
thread.title_full: le stanze del vetro presents ettore sottsass’ glass exhibition in venice

author: juliana neira I designboom
title: le stanze del vetro presents ettore sottsass’ glass exhibition in venice
text:
10 april – 30 july 2017 le stanze del vetro 


on the occasion of the 100th anniversary of the birth of italian architect ettore sottsass (1917 – 2007), ‘le stanze del vetro’ exhibition celebrates his glass and crystal production. with 200 works on display – mostly from the ernest mourmans collection – many of them will be showcased for the first time. curated by luca massimo barbero — director of the institute of art history of fondazione giorgiocini — the show will be held at the island of san giorgio maggiore in venice from the 10th of april to the 30th of july 2017 and it will be complemented by a catalog raisonné, published by skira. 
ettore sottsass
